Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 3 wickets with 7 balls remaining in the 19th over.
Shaheen Shah Afridi was named Player of the Match.
Barry McCarthy was awarded the Man of the Match (MVP).
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
Post-Match Reflections: Match referee Javagal Srinath praised the contest as a thrilling encounter.
Pakistan's Shaheen Shah Afridi and Ireland's Barry McCarthy were highlighted for their performances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 36th of Group A in the World Cup.
It was the T20I match number 2697.
